ch5_conclusion.speaker: Narrator
ch5_conclusion.text: The Masked Noble has found their true self. Beneath the ornate disguise was not a runaway, but a person searching for authenticity in a world of facades.

ch5_summary.speaker: Narrator
ch5_summary.text: Dragon Haven Cafe has become more than a place to eat. It's become a sanctuary where souls from all walks of life can shed their masks and discover who they truly are.

ch5_reflection.speaker: Narrator
ch5_reflection.text: From wanderers to captains, from nobles to common folk, each visitor has left changed. And through it all, your dragon has grown alongside you, witnessing every transformation.

ch5_end.speaker: Narrator
ch5_end.text:
Chapter 5 Complete: Unmasked

The noble has returned to their duties, changed forever by their time at Dragon Haven. The cafe's reputation now reaches even royal ears.
